stripeErrors.invalid_number: The card number is not a valid credit card number
stripeErrors.invalid_expiry_month: The card’s expiration month is invalid
stripeErrors.invalid_expiry_year: The card’s expiration year is invalid
stripeErrors.invalid_cvc: The card’s security code is invalid
stripeErrors.incomplete_cvc: The card’s security code is incomplete
stripeErrors.incomplete_expiry: The card’s expiration date is incomplete
stripeErrors.incorrect_cvc: The card’s security code is incorrect
stripeErrors.incorrect_zip: The card’s zip code failed validation
stripeErrors.invalid_expiry_year_past: The card’s expiration year is in the past

stripeErrors.processing_error: An error occurred while processing the card
